function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limitations in mapping model parameters to geographical space"},{"name":"Focus on a generalized model without simulation for the fine-grained location of patients"},{"name":"Problems with scientific verification of spread models"},{"name":"Reliance on iot tools for disease monitoring may lead to false alarms or missed cases"},{"name":"Rapid surge in traffic on iomt tech and telemedicine platforms due to covid-19 outbreak"},{"name":"Use of telemedicine platforms for screening covid-19"},{"name":"Reliance on a single device for remote health monitoring"},{"name":"Inadequate data validation leading to false alarms or missed critical symptoms"},{"name":"Overreliance on technology for diagnosis and assessment"},{"name":"Lack of integration of verified data sources in blockchain apps"},{"name":"Bluetooth contact tracing for covid-19"},{"name":"Limited adoption of contact tracing apps"},{"name":"Use of bluetooth for tracking covid-19 spread"},{"name":"Use of gps for monitoring covid-19 positive patients"},{"name":"The app may not accurately determine whether an individual has been exposed to a potential covid-19 patient, leading to false alerts or a lack of necessary alerts"},{"name":"Rapid and widespread adoption of the app without adequate understanding of its limitations and capabilities"},{"name":"False sense of security provided by the voice-detection app for covid-19 screening"},{"name":"Voice-based covid-19 diagnosis app may not be accurate or reliable"},{"name":"Issues of accuracy and reliability in contact tracing apps"},{"name":"Lack of willingness to use technology for covid-19 prevention"},{"name":"Reliance on ai for disease prediction without human interpretation"},{"name":"Dependence on ai for risk estimation of emerging infections"},{"name":"Reliance on technology for early identification of zoonotic viruses"},{"name":"Prediction of risk of infection, severe symptoms, and treatment outcomes using ai"},{"name":"Ai predictive models may have accuracy limitations and may not always provide accurate predictions for severe cases of covid-19."},{"name":"Repurposing of ai tools for covid-19 screening and diagnosis may lead to errors and inaccuracies in test results."},{"name":"Use of thermal face scans and ai-enabled cameras for temperature screening"},{"name":"Use of ai-enabled medical imaging for covid-19 diagnosis"},{"name":"Lack of unbiased data affecting ai model performance"},{"name":"Acceleration of testing kit development using ai"},{"name":"Potential false positive or false negative results in covid-19 screening due to voice detection technology."},{"name":"Reliance on ai for accurate diagnosis of covid-19 mutations."},{"name":"False identification of potential drug treatments for covid-19 through ai analysis."},{"name":"Use of ai in drug discovery for contagious diseases without thorough validation and testing"},{"name":"Repurposing existing drugs without sufficient evidence for effectiveness against covid-19"},{"name":"Development of ai-created drugs without comprehensive understanding of potential side effects"},{"name":"Use of ai in drug discovery may lead to misidentification of potential treatments for covid-19"},{"name":"Potential over-reliance on ai-driven drug discovery"},{"name":"Lack of experimental verification for predicted virus protein structures"},{"name":"Use of ai and machine learning for modeling virus structures"},{"name":"Use of ai for enforcing social distancing and lockdown measures"},{"name":"Challenges with ai models due to lack of historical data and noisy data"},{"name":"Ai systems assuming all contingencies are the same as those in the training dataset, leading to inaccurate decision-making"},{"name":"Dependence of ai on human knowledge and expertise for effective implementation in pandemic management"},{"name":"Recording covid-19 patient details on blockchain-based platforms"},{"name":"Incentivizing volunteer participation using blockchain technology"},{"name":"Integration of blockchain applications with legacy systems"},{"name":"Reliance on 5g technology for real-time telemedicine consultations may lead to connectivity issues and disruptions in patient care"},{"name":"Wearable iot devices for patient monitoring"},{"name":"Reliance on 5g network for real-time data transmission and communication between the patrol robots and authorities."}]}
